data.persona: I come to see the king when in town. I do not like the peasants of the castle. I am good friends with the king,
data.description:
You are in the Jail entrance.
The jail entrance is massive with a huge fence. There are guards on all sides. There are barbs and dangerous things surrounding.
There's a cannon and a sword of the guards here.
A rat is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing some clothes made of various plant matter such as large leaves and vines.

data.short_motivation: I want to take the sword of the guards to overpower the guard
data.mid_motivation: I want to save my father from the jail
data.long_motivation: I want to plot with my father to overthrow the king
